feed.title: Apache Teaclave (incubating)
feed.subtitle: Apache Teaclave (incubating) is an open source universal secure computing platform, making computation on privacy-sensitive data safe and simple.

entry.title: Mitigation of Intel-SA-00219 in Teaclave SGX SDK
entry.summary: This article is to help people understand Intel-SA-00219, and how Teaclave SGX SDK handles it.

entry.title: Podling Teaclave Report - January 2020
entry.summary: Resolve all renaming issues of INFRA (INFRA-19532) Refactor components: teaclaveutils, teaclaveconfig, teaclavecli, teaclavebinder Rewrite README.md to clearly explain the project's highlights in security, functionality, and usability. Start to use protobuf for RPC definition SGX SDK starts to use Intel SGX SDK v2.7.1

entry.title: Podling Teaclave Report - October 2020
entry.summary: Please feel free to add your own commentary.

entry.title: Announcing Apache Teaclave (incubating) 0.1.0
entry.summary: like remote attestation can be easily embedded in other projects. In addition, Teaclave SGX SDK can also be used separately to write standalone SGX enclaves for other purposes.

entry.title: Teaclave 安全计算开源生态 - 由 Teaclave 驱动的开源项目一览
entry.summary: Teaclave 生态也支持着可信计算和系统安全相关的学术研究，其中包括可信执行环境的安全，内存安全的 SGX SDK 设计，SGX 第三方库生态的安全等等相关课题。其中有多篇学术成果发表在国际顶级会议上。

entry.title: 让安全计算更简单 - Apache Teaclave (incubating) 0.1.0 正式发布
The Teaclave Secure Computing Ecosystem - Projects Powered by Teaclave
entry.summary: in the trusted computing environments, we maintains hundreds of Rust's libraries for TEE, e.g., crypto, scientific computation, and machine learning libraries. With these libraries around the Teaclave ecosystem, this drives the development of other projects powered by Teaclave. Furthermore, we are also incubating many important TEE components like MesaPy for SGX, and Rust OP-TEE TrustZone SDK.

entry.title: Roadmap in 2021: Project Maturity and Community Buildup
entry.summary: Last year, we published an RFC - "Roadmap: Towards the First Public Release". Thanks for the continuous efforts made by the community. We have completed several milestones and amazing achievements.

entry.title: Teaclave Meetup #1
entry.summary: scripting VM for SGX. More versatile scenarios: data analytics, machine learning, and smart contract.

entry.title: Teaclave Meetup #2
entry.summary: Mingshen also gave a brief introduction on the design and implementation of Teaclave client SDKs in different languages and their relationships.

entry.title: Apache Teaclave (incubating) 0.2.0 发布
entry.summary: Teaclave 0.2.0 版本可以在官网下载页面找到（注意验证 PGP 签名和 hash）。

entry.title: Announcing Apache Teaclave (incubating) 0.2.0
entry.summary: Teaclave 0.2.0 can be downloaded at the download page. Note that it is essential to verify the integrity of the downloaded file using the PGP signature (the .asc file) or a hash (the .sha256 file).

entry.title: Welcome Rust OP-TEE TrustZone SDK to Teaclave
entry.summary: can simply put #[tacreate], #[taopensession], #[taclosesession], #[tadestory], and #[tainvokecommand] annotations before corresponding functions. These annotations will automatically generate helper functions to bridge the normal/secure worlds.

entry.title: 欢迎 Rust OP-TEE TrustZone SDK 成为 Teaclave 子项目
